title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
Last night I deployed “Robotika X2 docker” and now I am able to download TAR containing folder “logs” with files:

```
score.yml
server_console.log
state.tlog
state.tlog-journal
subt_tunnel_practice_2019-09-09T21_16_15.885029506.log
summary.yml
```

Is it possible to extend this list for debug log from robot’s docker? If yes, how? What is the limitation of the log size? This would help me to check issues with IMU and simulation speed reported sooner, if they are also happening on “production machine”.

thanks a lot

   Martin/Robotika Team
content.html:
Last night I deployed “Robotika X2 docker” and now I am able to download TAR containing folder “logs” with files:

score.yml
server_console.log
state.tlog
state.tlog-journal
subt_tunnel_practice_2019-09-09T21_16_15.885029506.log
summary.yml

Is it possible to extend this list for debug log from robot’s docker? If yes, how? What is the limitation of the log size? This would help me to check issues with IMU and simulation speed reported sooner, if they are also happening on “production machine”.

thanks a lot

Martin/Robotika Team
